newsitem.title: USA: Specialized Health files for needle device.
newsitem.headline: Specialized Health files for needle device.

text.p: Specialized Health Products International Inc said Monday it has filed for approval to market its ExtraSafe Phlebotomy needle withdrawal device.
The device is designed for use with blood collection vacuum tubes and automatically retracts the needle into a safe container at the end of the procedure.
Units for field testing are under being produced, the company said.
Specialized Health said they filed a 510(k) with the Food and Drug Administration.
